subject: Football
College Athletics
Sports Injuries
Neck
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Rutgers beat Army, 23-20, on a touchdown run in overtime, but a neck injury sustained by defensive tackle Eric LeGrand was of greater concern.
snippet: Rutgers beat Army, 23-20, on a touchdown run in overtime, but a neck injury sustained by defensive tackle Eric LeGrand was of greater concern.
